collection.error.productnotreleased: This product could not be opened. You will be able to open it on the release date of the new expansion.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: Heal 20 damage and remove a Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.
Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If it's your first turn, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.
Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
Draw 2 cards. During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.
The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Both Active Pokémon are now Confused.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Discard up to 2 {W} Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 20 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 120 more damage.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {G} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.
This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your opponent's hand.
Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon. It can't retreat during your next turn.
The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Look at 1 of your face-down Prize cards.
This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attach a {F} Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has {F} Resistance, this attack does 50 more damage.
You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
Search your deck for a {G} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Passimian.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.
When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.
This Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

playmat.gametip.burnedsm.body: If your Pokémon is Burned, put a Burn marker on it. Between turns, put 2 damage counters on the Burned Pokémon. Then, that Pokémon's owner flips a coin. If heads, the Pokémon returns to normal.
playmat.prompt.chooseitemforhand: Choose an Item card to put into your hand.
playmat.prompt.sm1_14.synthesis: Choose a {G} Energy to attach to 1 of your Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.sm1_17.illuminate: Choose a {G} Pokémon to put into your hand.
playmat.prompt.sm1_29.doublejet: Choose up to 2 {W} Energy cards to discard.
playmat.prompt.sm1_49.searchinglight: Choose a face-down Prize card to look at.
playmat.prompt.sm1_49.searchinglight.2: This is the Prize card you chose. Select Done to continue.
playmat.prompt.trainer.timerball: Choose an Evolution Pokémon to put into your hand for each heads you flipped.
playmat.prompt.xyp_55.mudflood.opponent: These are the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. This attack will do 40 more damage for each revealed {W} Energy.
playmat.reminder.gxattack.body: Are you sure you want to use this attack? You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.

specialvisualizations.damagefromko: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack, it will do damage to the Attacking Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.player.evolvedpoke: Your evolved Pokémon can use any attack from their previous Evolutions.
specialvisualizations.player.pokemondeal: This player's attacks do more damage.
specialvisualizations.player.xy7_57.chao: This player can't play Pokémon Tool, Special Energy, or Stadium cards from their hand.
specialvisualizations.player.xy8_145.par: The attacks of this player's {G}, {R}, and {W} Pokémon do 20 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
This player can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.player.xy9_57.garb: Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile have no Abilities (except for Garbotoxin).
specialvisualizations.sm1_128.professork: Your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.xy4_36.bidebarrica: Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile have no Abilities (except for {P} Pokémon).
tpci.product.pcd.decidueye.deck.name: Forest Shadow
tpci.product.pcd.incineroar.deck.name: Roaring Heat
tpci.product.pcd.primarina.deck.name: Bright Tide
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.name: Forest Shadow
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.text: Moving through the trees with ultimate stealth: Decidueye! This hard-striking deck paints a target on your foe—and hits the bull's-eye. Take aim with the Forest Shadow theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.name: Roaring Heat
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.text: Explode with the fiery power of Incineroar! Add fuel to the fire with a fast-burning, fast-punching team built of pure power and aggression. Throw it all into the fight with the Roaring Heat theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.name: Bright Tide
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.text: Light up the waters and overwhelm your foe with Primarina! Combine water and lightning, and send your Pokémon team surging through howling storms with the Bright Tide theme deck!
tpci.product.sm1.pcd.sell-text: Welcome to the tropical Alola region! Start your journey with Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio, then seek out the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo-GX and Lunala-GX to witness the awesome power of a new kind of Pokémon: each Pokémon-GX brings an attack so devastating that you can use only one of them per game! Discover dozens of never-before-seen Pokémon, Alola forms of some familiar favorites, and new ways to battle in the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon expansion!
